mapper.select: SELECT E_CODE, (SELECT M_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE M_CODE = E.M_CODE) M_CODE, PROJ_NAME, PROJ_COMMENT, SAVE_DATE, IS_SHARE, E_USE_COUNT FROM EDIT E WHERE E_CODE = #{e_code}
SELECT * FROM EDIT WHERE IS_SHARE = 'Y' AND M_CODE = #{m_code} AND NOT E_CODE IN #{e_code}
SELECT * FROM EDIT WHERE IS_SHARE = 'Y' ORDER BY SAVE_DATE DESC

SELECT E_CODE,PROJ_NAME,PROJ_COMMENT,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDIT_REPLY_BOARD E2 WHERE E1.E_CODE = E2.E_CODE) E_USE_COUNT FROM EDIT E1 WHERE IS_SHARE = 'Y' GROUP BY E_CODE,PROJ_NAME,PROJ_COMMENT,E_USE_COUNT ORDER BY 4 DESC

SELECT E_CODE,PROJ_NAME,PROJ_COMMENT,(SELECT NVL(AVG(ER_RATE),0) FROM EDIT_REPLY_BOARD E2 WHERE E1.E_CODE = E2.E_CODE AND E_USE_COUNT IS NOT NULL) E_USE_COUNT FROM EDIT E1 WHERE IS_SHARE = 'Y' GROUP BY E_CODE,PROJ_NAME,PROJ_COMMENT,E_USE_COUNT ORDER BY 4 DESC
